FuncDef: This command defines the SONET/SDH path.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the components making up the specified SONET/SDH path. Depending on the type of SONET/SDH port the sonet-sdh-index must specify more path indexes to specify the payload location of the path. The sonet-sdh-index differs for SONET and SDH ports. Values-sts192 (for the 7950 XRS only).
